mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account(account_id, role_id, account_password, account_name, account_sex, account_phone, account_address, par_id, account_class_id, t_subject) VALUES(#{accountId}, #{roleId}, #{accountPassword}, #{accountName}, #{accountSex}, #{accountPhone}, #{accountAddress}, #{parId}, #{accountClassId}, #{tSubject})
mapper.select: SELECT account_id, role_id, account_password, account_name, account_sex, account_phone, account_address, par_id, account_class_id, t_subject FROM account WHERE account_id = #{value}
